subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: Looking ahead to when and how Lance Armstrong will be stripped of his Tour de France titles, and what is likely to happen next despite Armstrong ending his fight in the case against him.
